en-GB.summary: Find out what's going on today at the Houses of Parliament.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Parliament whats on at the House of Commons.
Alexa, ask Parliament who's my MP.
en-GB.name: Parliament
en-GB.description:
Find out what's on at the Houses of Parliament today. From an overview of events, through to the full calendar.

For an overview of both houses say:
• Alexa, ask Parliament what's on?

For commons or lords, try:
• Alexa, ask Parliament what's on at the House of Commons?
• Alexa, ask Parliament what's on at the House of Lords?

If you'd like a full breakdown of the schedule, simply respond 'yes' when asked if you'd like to hear more.
